titles.title: Taxpayers' Freedom of Conscience Act of 2011
To prohibit any Federal official from expending any Federal funds for any population control or population planning program or any family planning activity.

bill.summary: Taxpayers' Freedom of Conscience Act of 2011 - Prohibits a federal official from expending federal funds for any foreign or domestic population control or population planning program or family planning activity (including any abortion procedure).
